definition: The term refers to the imaginary line that separates the sky from the earth, typically seen as a straight line extending from left to right. It is commonly used to describe the boundary where the sky and the land or sea appear to meet when observed from a specific vantage point.

examples.german: Der Horizont ist die scheinbare Grenze zwischen Himmel und Erde.
examples.english: The horizon is the apparent boundary between the sky and the earth.

examples.german: Von hier aus kann man den Horizont sehen.
examples.english: From here, you can see the horizon.

examples.german: Der Sonnenuntergang am Horizont war atemberaubend.
examples.english: The sunset on the horizon was breathtaking.

examples.german: Der Horizont erweitert sich, wenn man neue Erfahrungen sammelt.
examples.english: The horizon expands when you gain new experiences.
